body.name: KTGEE Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.3 Headphones 40Hrs Playtime with Charging Case, IPX5 Waterproof Stereo in-Ear Earphones with Microphone for iPhone Android Cell Phone Sports Workout, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 14 mins
features: LED Power Display & 40 Hours Playback: The T08 wireless earbuds can be used for about 8 hours (50%-60% volume) on a single charge, and with the compact charging case allows you to use them for 40 hours continuously. The Type-C charging port provides a faster and more convenient charging experience. The built-in dual LED power display allows you to keep track of the remaining power in the charging case and the charging status of the earbuds in real time.

Immersive Stereo Sound and Superior Clear Call: With 13mm speakers and the latest chips, our Bluetooth headphones can deliver powerful bass, clear mids and bright treble to immerse you into music. The built-in mic in each bluetooth earphones utilizes call noise cancellation to ensure clear and realistic sound. It will allow you to enjoy high-quality conversations anytime, anywhere.

Latest Bluetooth 5.3 One Step Auto Pairing: T08 Bluetooth Earbuds are equipped with the latest technology of Bluetooth version 5.3, which has more stable transmission, lower power consumption and offers extended range with fewer dropouts than Bluetooth 5.1, providing you with an uninterrupted calling and music experience. Once paired for the first time, simply take the two wireless earbuds out of the charging case, they will automatically pair. Compatible for iOS/Android/Windows devices.

Smart Touch Control & IPX5 Sweatproof: With smart touch control, you can easily control play/pause, skip to previous/next track, adjust volume, answer/end calls, enable voice assistance and more. What's more, the two earbuds can work alone, you can share one earbud with your partner, perfect for safe driving/working/dating etc. The IPX5 sweatproof can protect the earbuds from damage by sweat and slight raindrops, no worry even in intense sports!

Lightweight & Ears Painless: The T08 mini wireless earbuds feature an ergonomic semi-in-ear design and weigh just 0.12 ounces (one earbud), giving you a stable and comfortable fit. Besides, the sleek & compact case is suitable for carrying in your pocket or handbag. Perfect for workouts, biking, running, gaming, travelling and business. Jump out of the tangle of the wired headset and enjoy the freedom of movement all day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FAQ How to connect with my Phone？ 1. Take earbuds out of the case, they will auto power on and enter pairing mode. 2. Activate the Bluetooth setting on your phone, search and click “T08”to connect. 3. Connection successful. 4. After the first successful connection, it will auto reconnect with your device once you take earbuds out of the case. Can't connect to your device? Two earbuds can't pair with each other? Please reset your earbuds. How to reset earbuds? 1. Quickly tap the Left or Right earbud's Multi-function button 5 times, the earbuds will power off with a voice prompt ‘Power off’. 2. Delete ‘T08’ bluetooth record on your phone and deactivate the bluetooth setting. 3. Put the earbuds back into the charging case. 4. Wait for 10s to open the charging case and turn on the bluetooth of your phone. 5. Click ‘T08’ to connect, earbuds will work properly. How to solve the problem with only one-side earbuds having sound? Please check if both earbuds are turned on , long tapboth Right and Left "MFB" buttons 5 seconds to turn on the earbuds. Only one side earbud charged? Please clean the charging contacts and eartip mesh with alcohol pads regularly to remove dust or earwax that may affect the charging or volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The KTGEE T08 wireless earbuds are AMAZING! I purchased these earbuds with little thought of how they would sound. But, after reading the info about these earbuds (Bluetooth 5.3, 40 hrs play time, charging case with a LED screen showing the amount of charge left, and works with iPhones). The earbuds also being WATERPROOF is an unexpected plus! They are rated at 4.8 which is very impressive and the price is reasonable. I have several other earbuds at different stages and styles to compare the NEW earbuds against when I got them.The packaging was tightly packed and plastic sealed (NICE)! The instructions are really EASY to understand along with illustration. The earbuds synced with my iPhone with ease. And I noticed that when I use these earbuds, they QUICKLY sync to my phone. Unlike my other earbuds. The sound is GREAT and CLEAR! What REALLY got my attention and a little EXCITED was the fact of the earbuds feeling feather weight LITE and COMFORTABLE in my ears. Even though my NEW earbuds fit securely in my ears, without music; I had to touch my ears to make sure they were still in. And my BEST compliment about these earbuds is the fact that the touch to control whatever I need to do is very PRECISE! Just a simple touch and the earbuds respond as they should! My past earbuds purchased would NOT respond unless I’m touching the earbuds several times before it responds (if it responds). Which has made me irritated in having to try any command. And my other earbuds are not that old.So, sum things up; I purchased the KTGEE T08 earbuds not expecting much. But, noticeably getting earbuds exactly how they are described and much more! I also APPRECIATE the quality of the air buds! Even though I didn’t give the purchase of these earbuds much thought, using them has REALLY captured my attention! Noting that these KTGEE T08 earbuds are a GOOD DEAL and a GREAT PURCHASE! I’m SATISFIED that the earbuds surpassed, my mediocre expectations. It’s definitely worth the price and purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product - reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I lost one of my Apple ear buds and looked to replace it. Cost would have been $45 for a refurbished model. I thought I would try these for almost 1/2 of that price. These are terrific substitutes for the name brand. They fit well, sound is good, charge quickly and hold a charge a lot longer than the very expensive models. I have just had these for a few weeks - so far so good. At this price I can replace them eery few years and still be ahead of the game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Wireless Earbuds: Great Audio
reviews.reviewText: I recently got my hands on a pair of wireless AirPods and I have to say, they have exceeded all my expectations. These sleek and stylish earbuds are not just convenient, but they also deliver an exceptional audio experience.One of the standout features of the AirPods is their seamless connectivity. With just a simple tap, they effortlessly connect to my iPhone, allowing me to listen to my favorite tunes without any hassle. The Bluetooth connection is strong and stable, ensuring uninterrupted playback even when I'm on the move.The sound quality is simply outstanding. The AirPods deliver crisp and clear audio with rich bass and detailed highs. Whether I'm listening to my favorite rock anthems or relaxing with some classical music, the AirPods never fail to impress. The soundstage is wide, providing an immersive listening experience that rivals even some premium over-ear headphones.Comfort-wise, these AirPods are a dream. They fit perfectly in my ears and stay put, no matter how much I move around. The lack of wires is liberating, making them ideal for workouts or simply going about my daily activities. Additionally, the battery life is impressive, offering several hours of continuous listening before needing to be charged.The convenience factor is another major plus. The AirPods come with a handy charging case, which not only protects them but also doubles as a portable charger. This means that even when I'm on the go, I can easily recharge my AirPods and enjoy uninterrupted music.Overall, I can confidently say that the wireless AirPods are worth every penny. Their seamless connectivity, exceptional sound quality, comfortable fit, and long battery life make them the perfect companion for music lovers. If you're looking for wireless earbuds that deliver on both style and substance, look no further than the AirPods.I highly recommend them to anyone seeking a truly wireless audio experience.Rating: ★★★★★

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. In the few short hours since I received my package…These earbuds have met and exceeded my expectations. The sound quality for how affordable they are is phenomenal and I don’t think anyone could ask for much more. A breeze to set up from out of the box. They connected with ease to a Windows Laptop, and iPhone. The device toggles nicely between devices with no lag. Am able to close my laptop, and they connect back to my iPhone and vice versa if I were to manually disconnect the Bluetooth on my iPhone.I really like the display on the front of the charging case because you can pretty much tap the cover and the display has little bars on the right and left corners to indicate the charge in each earbud, and a battery percentage number for the charging case itself which is neat compared to other budget brands where you have to wait for them to pair to the device you’re using for a voice prompt message or searching in the device Bluetooth settings, or trying to see the blinking lights on the charger case itself.No complaints here, honestly.Affordable, Simple, Sleekly Styled & Functional

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Particularly when you consider the cost, these offer a great value. Pairing with Bluetooth is quick, easy, and stable. Sound for music is pretty good, two way sound for phone calls seems good. I really appreciate the battery life indicator on the case, which takes away the guesswork on wondering how much power is left. Battery life is really good. And while you get better sound isolation and quality from ear buds that seal in your ears, I really prefer to wear this open type. I have no idea how long they’ll last, but happy with them for now.
